name: JOREST 155 in 1 Mini Electric Screwdriver Cordless, Precision Power Screwdriver Set, 5 Torque Levels (Max 0.75N.m), Gifts for Men, Magnetic Repair Tool Kit for iPhone, PC, Laptop, PS4 PS5, Xbox, Watch
short_description: 【Powerful and Convenient】 The JOREST small electric screwdriver offers 5 adjustable torque levels (0.15-0.75N.m) for precise control, with a 7N.m manual torque for extra power when needed. Warm Tips: Since most screws are often factory-secured with glue, it's recommended to loosen them manually first, then switch to electric mode for efficient removal.

【User-Friendly Design】 Electric handle + manual handle dual mode design, ergonomic non-slip aluminum alloy electric handle, lightweight and compact body design, easy to operate in a narrow space and reduce hand fatigue during extended use. Plus, four built-in LED lights in electric screwdriver enhances visibility in dim workspace, ensuring precision.

【Rechargeable and Long-Lasting】 Powered by a 500mAh rechargeable battery and speed 200 RPM motor, 1 hour full charge, tested to work continuously for 1.5 hours, unscrewing 1500 screws, easily complete maintenance work and save your wrist. The Type-C port ensures a convenient charging experience.

【Comprehensive and Durable】Comes with a magnetic and durable case that keeps the electric screwdriver and accessories are securely stored and labeled for quick access. A portable and complete toolbox is also a perfect choice for mens birthday gifts, DIY lovers, Christmas gifts, Father’s Day gifts!

【Widely Applications】Equipped with 140 precision bits of different specifications and 13 additional accessories, covering various daily repair needs. And an anti static wrist wrap and magnetic mat are included for your more professional tech repairs. This little electric screwdriver kit is ideal for repairing computer, laptop, cell phone, pc, rc car, drone, switch, PS4 PS5 console and controller, watches, and other IT tech devices.

Note: This set is an upgraded version of the standard manual precision screwdriver and is not suitable for repairing large equipments. To extend the lifespan of it, we recommend using the type-c cable provided by us for charging.

name: SKIL Rechargeable 4V Cordless Screwdriver with Circuit Sensor Technology Includes 45pcs Bit Set, USB Charging Cable, Carrying Case - SD561204
short_description: FOR EVERYDAY USE - This cordless electric screwdriver is your go-to for small projects
CIRCUIT SENSOR TECHNOLOGY - Patented technology safely detects electrical current in outlets switches and fixtures
EASY TO USE - Change to forward or reverse with a turn of the collar
FORGET DOWN TIME - A rechargeable lithium-ion battery keeps this tool charged over an extended period of time
READY TO GO - Power up your cordless screwdriver anywhere with micro USB charging
DUAL LED LIGHT - Makes it easy to see in dimly lit areas
product_description: Your Go-to Power Screwdriver. The SKIL rechargeable 4V cordless screwdriver unique circuit sensor technology is a patented feature that detects live wires in outlets switches, cords, and fixtures from up to one inch away. Simply hold the cordless screwdriver near the source of electricity and press the detection button. If the circuit is Live, the red light illuminates and an alert sounds. With this feature, you'll always know where live circuits are located before getting started on your project. More about this product: 230 RPM, easy to use, circuit sensor technology, automatic spindle lock feature, integrated rechargeable Lithium-Ion battery, micro USB charging, LED work light.

name: HARFINGTON 5pcs #00 Phillips Screwdriver Bit PH00 1/4" Hex Shank 2" (50mm) Long Magnetic S2 Steel Industrial Grade Screw Driver Bit Cross Head Electric Drill Bits 0.098" (2.5mm) Rod
short_description: Size - Phillips head size: PH00 (#00); hex shank size: 1/4"; overall length: 50mm / 2"; rod diameter: 2.5mm / 0.098"; hardness: HRC59-61 (The recognized stable hardness is around HRC60.). Screws for large household appliances are mainly PH2, those for small household appliances are mainly PH1, and those for precision instruments are mainly PH0/PH00/PH000.

Material - Phillips screwdriver bits are made from specially heat-treated S2 steel for superior strength and durability, with a sandblasted surface for a textured effect for enhanced grip and corrosion resistance, suitable for industrial use.

Features - The head of the screwdriver is magnetized for easy use. Cross head with magnetism can stably absorb the screw vertically or obliquely, making it easy to fix the screw, especially in a small space. Precision CNC machined Phillips head, reduces head wear during high-intensity tightening operations.

Application - Phillips head drill bit specifically designed for driving screws into wood, metal, and other materials effortlessly. Can accurately tighten screws without damaging screws and screwdriver bits. 1/4" hex shank driver bits can be used with electric screwdrivers, manual screwdrivers, electric drills, etc. for electricians, mechanical repair work, and furniture installation.

Note - Make sure the screwdriver bit is firmly inserted into the power tool chuck before operation. Adjust power tool speed and torque settings according to the material being processed. Avoid using excessive force when tightening the screws to prevent the bit from being damaged or slipping out. Store the screwdriver bit in a dry place to prevent rust and maintain its performance.
product_details: Compatible Fastener Range ‎PH00 (#00) Phillips screws for precision instruments

product_description: From assembling furniture and toys to tightening screws in hard-to-reach cabinets, get small jobs and repairs done quickly and comfortably with the SKIL Twist 2.0 4V Rechargeable Screwdriver. This ergonomic electric screwdriver features a patent-pending pivoting head that locks between three positions — 0, 22.5, and 45 degrees — for improved comfort in tight spaces. It features three torque settings that allow you to adapt to the application at hand. Its trigger button is conveniently located for easy one-finger use, and its bright LED lights up dark spaces. The power screwdriver’s integrated battery features a USB-C charging port with included cable for convenient recharging. This cordless electric screwdriver kit comes with a 28-piece set of commonly used bits including (22) 1-inch bits, (5) 2-inch slim bits, and a 2-3/8-inch magnetic bit holder.
